truths: Move the blue square block B1 upwards.

pred: Move to the center of the arena while holding B1.
cot:
The ground truth goals all describe actions that involve moving block B1 towards the center or upwards in the arena. The predicted goal specifies moving to the center of the arena while holding B1, which aligns with the intent of carrying block B1 to the center as described in the ground truths.

Therefore, the predicted goal is (2) Correct, as an agent that tries to achieve the predicted goal will succeed in achieving the real goal described by the ground truths.
